text: Kindia is a region in the west of Guinea. It is bordered by the country of Sierra Leone and the Guinean regions of Conakry, Labé, Mamou, and Boké. The regional capital is the city of Kindia. As of the 2014 census, 1,561,374 people lived there. It has an area of . == Prefectures == * Coyah Prefecture * Dubréka Prefecture * Forécariah Prefecture * Kindia Prefecture * Télimélé Prefecture Category:Regions of Guinea
title: Kindia Region
